preqs: Students must have passed ECW1101 or ECG1101 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ECB2141, ECG9170, ECS2141, ECW2141}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ECB1101, ECF1100, ECG1101, ECP1100, ECS1101, ECW1101} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}

description: Topics include the supply of and the demand for labour, education and training, the operation of labour markets, including the role of institutions in the labour market, wage relativities, disadvantaged groups in the labour market, and the role of trade unions. Also included is a study of the macroeconomic implications of wage changes and a consideration of wages policy. Special attention is given to the current labour market conditions.
